speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, following leader remarks, the Senate will resume consideration of the motion to proceed to the energy speculation legislation. Sometime after 11 today, the Senate will proceed to a rollcall vote on the motion to proceed to the bill. The Senate will recess from 12:30 until 2:15 in order to allow for the weekly caucus luncheons. Tomorrow, there will be a classified briefing for Senators in S-407 from 4 until 5:30 p.m. with National Security Adviser Stephen Hadley.
